content: lion brand pattern # 60065 corrections applied mar 29 2006 skill level easy level 2 microspun article #910 2 colors 1 ball each *coral & lime* crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers petals are crocheted in sections then sewn together to make a diminutive purse see also 60066 child s blossom purse 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/childs-blossom-purse
